speaker: BRUTUS
text_entry: SCENE II. The same. The field of battle.

speaker: BRUTUS
text_entry: Ride, ride, Messala, ride, and give these bills

speaker: BRUTUS
text_entry: Unto the legions on the other side.

speaker: BRUTUS
text_entry: Let them set on at once; for I perceive

speaker: BRUTUS
text_entry: But cold demeanor in Octavius' wing,

speaker: BRUTUS
text_entry: And sudden push gives them the overthrow.

speaker: BRUTUS
text_entry: Ride, ride, Messala: let them all come down.
